Content.Text:
<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm afraid it's time for everyone to go home.
Please get ready to go back to town.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<NICKNAME>, it's time to go home. We should be
on our way.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
And we're back. Please come by and see me any
time you want to explore the Safari park.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
And we're back, <NICKNAME>. Please come by
and see me any time you want to explore the
Safari park.
